channel.title: Killing people who arent in jail and are not staff?
channel.description:
Id like to apply a deathstage to people who are not jailed, but in they jail area and that are not staff. id understand how to set up the coords, just not applying it to people who are jailed as it doe not change their char settings?
any help?

item.title: Killing people who arent in jail and are not staff?
item.dc:creator: @oldschoolscape oldschoolscape
item.description:
@oldschoolscape wrote:

[quote=“o.O O.o, post:10, topic:277583”]boolean isInJail() { if(coords for being in there; just like wildy) { return true; } return false; }

if(isInJail() == true && playerRights < 1 && jailed == false) { applyDead(); //or whatever } [/quote]

Wow thanks, will that not kill everyone who is in the jail coordinates though? i need the people who have actually been jailed to stay alive 0.0

Read full topic
item.source: Killing people who arent in jail and are not staff?

if(isInJail() == true && playerRights < 1 && jailed == false) { applyDead(); //or whatever }

item.title: Killing people who arent in jail and are not staff?
item.dc:creator: @Bladex0x Bladex0x
item.description:
@Bladex0x wrote:

[quote=“oldschoolscape, post:3, topic:277583”][quote author=huslar link=topic=366463.msg2777881#msg2777881 date=1241629984]
sorry i realy do not get wat you are saying talk more clear?
[/quote]

sorry, i was in a rush, well im fed up of people coming into my jail when they are not staff, and have not been jailed.

I want to see if its possible to create a code that will kill anyone who has walked into my jail.

I do not want people who have actually been jailed to die.

i do not want staff to die.

Im not sure how i would go about this though as when you ::jail someone it does not go in their char rights?[/quote]put a right to go into ur “jail”
